∴E′−K′=πK(12+sθ˙2θ2)=π2K+πsKθ˙2θ2,又 πs=−log⁡q=πK′K=π2K+1KπK′Kθ˙2θ2=π2K+πK′K2θ˙2θ2(w.r.t.s)(2.3.18a)\begin{aligned} \therefore E' - K'& = \frac{\pi}{K} \left( \frac{1}{2} + s \frac{\dot{\theta}_2}{\theta_2} \right)\\ &= \frac{\pi}{2K} + \frac{\pi s}{K} \frac{\dot{\theta}_2}{\theta_2}, \quad \text{又 } \pi s = -\log q = \pi \frac{K'}{K}\\ &= \frac{\pi}{2K} + \frac{1}{K} \pi \frac{K'}{K} \frac{\dot{\theta}_2}{\theta_2}\\ &= \frac{\pi}{2K} + \frac{\pi K'}{K^2} \frac{\dot{\theta}_2}{\theta_2} \quad (w.r.t. s) \quad\quad(2.3.18a) \end{aligned} ∴E′−K′​=Kπ​(21​+sθ2​θ˙2​​)=2Kπ​+Kπs​θ2​θ˙2​​,又 πs=−logq=πKK′​=2Kπ​+K1​πKK′​θ2​θ˙2​​=2Kπ​+K2πK′​θ2​θ˙2​​(w.r.t.s)(2.3.18a)​
